text:
Getting dressed in the morning can be stressful, especially when you don't have the energy (or time) to craft the perfect outfit. Between choosing pieces that go together just right, and adding accessories into the mix, this sometimes strenuous process can take what seems like forever. Jessica Alba's jumpsuit obsession proves that looking polished doesn't have to be complicated, and sometimes one statement piece can bring a whole look together.

As an actor, businesswoman, and mother, Alba knows what it means to be busy. Whether she's on her way to meetings, spending time with her family, or enjoying herself at a star-studded event, Alba demonstrates time and time again the power of jumpsuits — no matter the occasion.

If you've avoided jumpsuits in the past, now's the time to reconsider. Think about it: There's nothing easier than throwing on one, simple piece — and it's beyond easy to style. Pair a jumpsuit with casual sneakers for a weekend look, or throw on a pair of heels for post-work drinks — jumpsuits leave room for variety.

Ahead, see how Alba styles her favorite jumpsuits , and while you're at it, shop The Zoe Report's go-to jumpsuits for the easiest of outfit formulas.

The Utility Jumpsuit

MediaPunch/Shutterstock

Alba was photographed in New York City earlier this summer in a khaki jumpsuit while on her way to an appearance on New York Live. The actor added a pop of color to the neutral ensemble in the form of cherry-red mules and a white bag. Her hair looked playful in a half-up, voluminous ponytail with thick hoops.

Shop The Look

The Wide-Leg Jumpsuit

Kristin Callahan/ACE Pictures/Shutterstock

Alba walked through New York City in Aug. wearing yet another version of her favorite trend. This time, she chose a wide-leg, belted jumpsuit with a faint checkered print. The actor let her hair down in undone waves and accessorized with a crossbody, navy-blue bag.

Shop The Look

The Navy Jumpsuit

Broadimage/Shutterstock

Alba layered this easy, navy jumpsuit under a matching trench coat at Los Angeles International Airport. She kept the look simple, opting for a tank top, white sneakers, and a white bag. Jumpsuits are the perfect airport companion, as they're just as comfortable as they are fashion forward.
